argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ngpds.n | |- N = ( norm ` G ) |
| 2 |  | ngpds.x | |- X = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | ngpds.m | |- .- = ( -g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | ngpds.d | |- D = ( dist ` G ) |
| 5 |  | #P_ngpxms | |- ( G e. NrmGrp -> G e. *MetSp ) |
| 6 | 2, 4 | #P_xmssym | |- ( ( G e. *MetSp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( B D A ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( B D A ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_ngpds | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ B e. X /\ A e. X ) -> ( B D A ) = ( N ` ( B .- A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3com23 | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( B D A ) = ( N ` ( B .- A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. NrmGrp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( N ` ( B .- A ) ) ) |
